member.name: D3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC.DepthWriteMask
member.summary: Identify a portion of the depth-stencil buffer that can be modified by depth data (see ).

member.name: D3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC.DepthFunc
member.summary: A function that compares depth data against existing depth data. The function options are listed in .

member.name: D3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC.StencilReadMask
member.summary: Identify a portion of the depth-stencil buffer for reading stencil data.

member.name: D3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC.StencilWriteMask
member.summary: Identify a portion of the depth-stencil buffer for writing stencil data.

member.name: D3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC.FrontFace
member.summary: Identify how to use the results of the depth test and the stencil test for pixels whose surface normal is facing towards the camera (see ).

member.name: D3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_DESC.BackFace
member.summary: Identify how to use the results of the depth test and the stencil test for pixels whose surface normal is facing away from the camera (see ).
